name: Fruit Join Splash
description: Fruit Join Splash is the free and most addictive line puzzle game. Join long chain of adjacent same fruits and burst them, more fruits burst at same time more score you will get. Use combo fruit to fast finish the game and move on next level, also remember you must have play fast because time is count down. Each level is progressively challenging and very addictive. Providing more than 100 addictively compelling levels, stunning effects and small game size.
